wiczenia {#cwiczenia} Exercise 2.1 Prepare the histogram for the size of orders in the internet shop. Calculate the number of bins and bin width indicated by the square root rule, Sturges formula and FD formula. In your opinion, what the optimal number of bins be? Is the distribution of order amount left or right skewed?
